item.title: Mother of the Mother of God: Why You Should Have a Devotion to St. Anne
item.description: July 26th is the feast of St. Anne, grandmother of Jesus and mother of the Blessed Virgin Mary. As with so many other “extra-scriptural” aspects of our faith, devotions are like beautiful decorations, comforts, touchstones in the annual cycle of the Liturgical Calendar.
